data.eml:eml: Britorchestia, a new talitrid genus from western Europe and the Mediterranean Sea and a revision of Pseudorchestoidea and Sardorchestia (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Talitridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bopiah, Arundathi (2012): Britorchestia, a new talitrid genus from western Europe and the Mediterranean Sea and a revision of Pseudorchestoidea and Sardorchestia (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Talitridae). Zootaxa 3451: 60-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.215408
